abstract: Coca-Cola spent millions to showcase its flagship Coke Classic brand in Super Bowl ads on Sunday, but the $40 million it invested Tuesday in a trendy tea company might be a better indicator of its sales growth plans.
lead_paragraph: Coca-Cola spent millions to showcase its flagship Coke Classic brand in Super Bowl ads on Sunday, but the $40 million it invested Tuesday in a trendy tea company might be a better indicator of its sales growth plans.

headline.main: Coca-Cola Brews $40 Million Deal for Stake in Honest Tea
